summary: DC Comics, originally named Detective Comics, is an American comic book publisher. It's one of the oldest and biggest companies, started in 1937. DC is known for famous superheroes like Superman, Batman, and Wonder Woman, and teams like the Justice League. Their stories happen in a fictional world called the DC Universe. The company has moved its offices around New York City over the years and is now based in California. DC and its competitor Marvel Comics are the top two comic book publishers in America.
title: DC Comics
